snippet: A federal judge approved a $415 million settlement that ended a lengthy legal dispute stemming from claims that Apple, Google and several other Silicon Valley companies had illegally conspired to prevent their workers from getting better job offers.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Lucy Koh approves $415 million settlement in lawsuit that will pay more than 64,000 tech workers around $5,800 each; suit claimed Google, Apple and other Silicon Valley tech firms kept workers from better job opportunities.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge approved a $415 million settlement that ended a lengthy legal dispute stemming from claims that Apple, Google and several other Silicon Valley companies had illegally conspired to prevent their workers from getting better job offers.

headline.main: Workers Awarded $5,800 Each In Settlement With Tech Giants
headline.print_headline: Workers Awarded $5,800 Each in Settlement With Tech Giants
